attributes.action: To enforce the Law and jail perverts involved in sexual deviation in Parks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Police are ignoring the safety of the public in Parks.
They are allowing sexual perverts to prowl like animals in parks.Parents cannot trust the authorities to ensure the safety of our children in parks.
Parks are meant for the pleasure of children and families to enjoy the freedom and fresh air.Instead thanks to our authorities in Councils and the law, cowardly ignoring the problem,we have these so called civilised people acting like animals on heat, either taking part in sexual activity or sneaking around leering.
